title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state “no” and/or does explain that it is not possible for Sarah to consume the combination of 3 snacks and 5 movies because her income is not sufficient. The combination will cost her $65, but she has a limited income of only $50.

The response states “no” and explains that it is not possible for Sarah to consume the combination of 3 snacks and 5 movies because her income is not sufficient. The combination will cost her $65, but she has a limited income of only $50.
